name: husk
notes:
a pinch of crows, a dash of cornfields, and paranormal scarecrows combine to make a creepy horror classic. stir in the obligatory car crash and abandoned farm. mix well. enjoy!

 a small lattice pattern and a modified basket weave stitch are used to give the impression of straw. 

materials
100 grams fingering weight yarn.
size 2.25 mm needles, or size to obtain gauge

gauge
32 stitches and 40 rounds to 4 inches in pattern.

this sock is part of super sock scarefest 2025.

it will be available to all after this year's scarefest ends.
